text.__SUMMARY__: Garcinia quaesita is a species of flowering plant in the family Clusiaceae. It is found only in Sri Lanka.
text.Common names:
English: red mango, Indian tamarind, brindleberry
Sinhala: kana goraka, honda goraka
Tamil: korakkaipuli
text.Etymology:
The generic name is after L. Garcin (1683–1751)
